title: Making Ranked team
body:
Main reason for team is to have fun, make friends and try new things out!
All welcome reguardless of Tier.

replies.body:
hey ciao, me and my friend would like to join your ranked team. We can fill any position. 

i am already in your friend list so invite me to ranked team when u make one

Add me if you like - Fakehero. 
I play Support, keen to play tonight!
